job description:
TEKsystems is seeking a Business Data Analyst for a client in Kansas City, MO.

Our customer is looking for an experienced data analyst to work with business units to gather information and translate that information into detailed technical requirements. In addition, this individual will be working with the technical teams to translate requirements and conduct meetings with the business end clients.

Required Skills:
  • Understand how to analyze data
  • Ability to write SQL logic for developing technical requirements
  • Ability to conduct meetings with Business and Technical teams
  • Knowledge in reporting tools
  • Exposure to working with a data warehouse (i.e. table joins, foreign keys, data modeling concepts, and transformation rules)
    • Please reach out to Nicole Lund with TEKsystems for more information.
